Subject: Environmental Influence on the Evolution of Morphological Complexity
 in Machines

Hi everyone,

I hope your new year is off to a great start.

I want to share with you our recent paper (employing CPPNs) that was 
just published in PLoS Computational Biology

http://www.ploscompbiol.org/article/info%3Adoi%2F10.1371%2Fjournal.pcbi.1003399

It is currently at the top of 'Featured Research' on their main page:

http://www.ploscompbiol.org/

We've also had some nice press coverage on this work:

http://io9.com/simulations-show-how-complex-bodies-evolve-in-challengi-1493802315 


http://motherboard.vice.com/blog/to-create-advanced-robots-let-them-evolve-in-complex-environments 


http://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2014-01/plos-eaa123013.php

I'd be happy to answer any questions you might have in regard to this.

Best regards and happy new year!

-Josh

-- 
Dr. Joshua E. Auerbach
Postdoctoral Researcher
Laboratory of Intelligent Systems
